name: International Chef
description:
Make food from all around the world in a cozy little restaurant and learn about your customer's roots!

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2023 with the theme "Roots". 

Inspired by our dev team's diverse collection of cultures and experiences, we wanted to make a game showcasing the food from each of our cultures, and dive into the roots of how food, background, environment and experiences are closely linked.

DISCLAIMER: This work is IN PROGRESS! We will continue to flesh out the game after the jam ends.
